thread.title: Baby threatened, several stabbed in Greyhound bus drama

title: Baby threatened, several stabbed in Greyhound bus drama
text:
Baby threatened, several stabbed in Greyhound bus drama Wednesday, March 07, 2018 - 01:18 
A woman faces multiple charges after allegedly stabbing several people and threatening to kill a three-year-old child aboard a greyhound bus in California. Colette Luke has more. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A woman faces multiple charges after allegedly stabbing several people and threatening to kill a three-year-old child aboard a greyhound bus in California. Colette Luke has more.
